name: Eat Kiwis Or Die Trying
description:
The title says it all, Eat Kiwis Or Die Trying.

This is a small prototype I created while experimenting with sine waves.  The animal you play as has a retractable neck that is procedurally generated using a sine wave.  Simple but fun. Please comment if this seems like a project worth making into a full game. Currently the game becomes impossible after level 200+.

Enjoy!
